subPoints: general - choices behind the plot(s) were well done, resulting in clear and informative data presentation

positive.mainPoint: The plot details were good regarding

subPoints: The choices behind the plot creation were generally good, but there is some room for improvement.
plot type(s) - poorly chosen. It would have been more appropriate to plot the data as:
related plots/data - should have the same axis range, allowing for direct comparisons
Combining the data into a single (or a reduced number) plots would have been a more concise data presentation and allow easier comparison.
The amount of data presented in a single plot was too much. It would have been better to separate the data into more plots, allowing one to clearly observe the data.
The way that the data was presented was too complicated. Making the plot simpler would enable help the viewer understand that data easier.

negative.mainPoint: Missing imporant plot elements, and/or the choice concerning them could have been done better
